global_style.style: Render a Modern Graphic Novel with sharp, crisp details. Text & Speech Bubbles: Speech bubbles must not touch or overlap panel edges. Bubble tails must clearly point to the speaking character’s face. All text must be highly visible and Accurate, using clean sans-serif comic lettering with at least 5px padding inside bubbles. Characters (all must appear together in the same environment)
global_style.line_style: Clean, medium-weight lines with selective detail. Semi-realistic facial expressions and body language (not overly cartoonish). Slightly stylized proportions to allow for expressiveness. Minimal cross-hatching mainly soft cel shading plus subtle halftone dots in shadow areas.

panels.learning_objective: Introduce Ava Kimani, the SLO Sentinel.
panels.takeaway: Meet Ava Kimani, your SLO Sentinel.
panels.scene_description: Full‑width panorama of the Nairobi skyline at dawn. Foreground: Ava Kimani on a rooftop, dreadlocks catching the breeze, holding her "Reliability you can measure" mug; subtle banking‑tower logos glow. High‑contrast teal/orange dawn light, crisp line work, cel shading; no motion blur.

speech_bubbles.ava: Welcome to measurable reliability. I’m Ava—your SLO Sentinel.

panels.monologue: Ava’s here to help you measure reliability.

panels.learning_objective: Recognize the gap between user expectations and system reliability.
panels.takeaway: User expectations are high, but reliability is low.
panels.scene_description: Split panel: Left—traditional bank branch with long queue; Right—mobile users staring at "transaction failed" screens. Ava inset top‑corner observing both worlds. Use red alert accents on phone screens.
panels.narration: Banking expectations have changed—but reliability hasn’t caught up.
panels.monologue: Ava’s here to help you bridge the gap.

panels.learning_objective: Recognize the unsustainable nature of heroic firefighting.
panels.scene_description: Interior ops‑war room at 3 a.m. Engineers slumped over keyboards; alert sirens flashing. Coffee cups, empty pizza boxes. Ava enters, wrist‑slap pose toward a ticker reading 99.999 % uptime.
panels.monologue: Ava’s here to help you avoid burnout.

panels.learning_objective: Understand the SRE journey from reactive to proactive.
panels.takeaway: SRE is a journey, not a sprint.
panels.scene_description: Staircase graphic labeled Incident Response → Monitoring → Testing → Prevention → Design for Reliability; Ava leads a diverse team upward. Nairobi skyline backdrop.

speech_bubbles.ava: Pole pole, ndio mwendo—one reliable step at a time.

panels.monologue: SRE is a journey, not a sprint.
